item.title: 最大的隔夜股票交易场所在波动后暂停交易
item.description: 美国最大的专用隔夜交易场所因陷入全球市场波动而被迫停止股票交易。【原文：The largest dedicated overnight trading venue in the US was forced to halt stock trading after getting caught up in global market volatility.】

item.title: 佛罗里达富裕的繁荣小镇借钱修复被飓风摧毁的码头
item.description: 佛罗里达州那不勒斯市正在求助于市政债券市场，重建被飓风伊恩肆虐的著名码头，这至少是该市因极端天气破坏而进行的第五次重建。【原文：Naples, Florida, is turning to the municipal bond market to rebuild its famous pier ravaged by Hurricane Ian, marking its at least its fifth reconstruction because of extreme weather damage.】

item.title: 都铎校友达梅什-马尼亚尔将关闭其宏观对冲基金
item.description: 达梅什-马尼亚尔（Dharmesh Maniyar）正在关闭他的对冲基金，因为在提出赎回要求后，他管理的资产不断减少。【原文：Dharmesh Maniyar is shutting down his hedge fund because of declining assets under management after redemption requests.】

item.title: 高盛称对冲基金买入周一美股跌势
item.description: 根据高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：As volatility gripped global markets to start the week, hedge funds stepped in to buy the big dip in technology shares, according to Goldman Sachs Group Inc.’s prime brokerage data.】

item.title: 奥地利推选劳工部长马丁-科切尔接替霍尔茨曼出任欧洲央行行长
item.description: 奥地利劳动和经济部长马丁-科切尔（Martin Kocher）将接替罗伯特-霍尔茨曼（Robert Holzmann）执掌奥地利央行。【原文：Austrian Labor and Economy Minister Martin Kocher is set to succeed Robert Holzmann at the helm of the central bank.】

item.title: 高风险借款人发现债券和贷款市场的大门正在关闭
item.description: 全球市场的动荡正威胁着夏季债务繁荣的终结，而夏季债务繁荣帮助一些风险最高的美国公司削减了借贷成本，推迟了到期日，甚至推迟了利息支付。【原文：The turmoil in global markets is threatening to end a summer debt boom that helped some of the riskiest US companies cut borrowing costs, push out maturities and even defer interest payments.】

item.title: 伊朗处决被控杀害伊斯兰革命卫队军官的抗议者
item.description: 据国营 Mizan Online 报道，一名男子在参加伊朗 2022 年全国起义后被捕，后被指控在抗议活动中杀害了一名伊斯兰革命卫队成员，他已于周二被处决。【原文：A man who was arrested after he took part in Iran’s nationwide 2022 uprising and later accused of killing a member of the Islamic Revolutionary Guard Corps during the protests was executed on Tuesday, state-run Mizan Online reported.】

item.title: 市场动荡加剧美联储和同行缓和立场的压力
item.description: 在这一年里，各国央行一直在权衡通胀率过高的风险和经济陷入衰退的可能性，现在决策者们需要考虑一个新的动态因素：动荡的金融市场。【原文：In a year that’s seen central banks weighing the risk of inflation staying too high against the chance of tipping economies into recession, policymakers now have a fresh dynamic to consider: volatile financial markets.】

item.title: 贪污成风的保加利亚为何无法停止选举
item.description: 8 月初，建立执政联盟的谈判破裂，保加利亚面临着三年半以来的第七次大选，因此，保加利亚正变得越来越难以治理。【原文：Bulgaria is looking increasingly ungovernable after talks to forge a ruling coalition collapsed in early August, leaving the country facing its seventh general election in three and a half years.】

item.title: BCA 研究策略师称新兴市场股票将下跌 20
item.description: 一位曾正确预测新兴市场股票在金融危机后十年表现不佳的策略师表示，由于美国经济疲软态势将持续，新兴市场股票正处于大跌的边缘。【原文：Emerging-markets stocks are on the cusp of a major selloff as US economic weakness is set to persist, according to a strategist who correctly predicted a decade of underperformance for the asset class in the wake of the financial crisis.】

item.title: 纽约市公交系统计划出售由豪宅税收支持的债务
item.description: 纽约市公交系统计划以其获得的房地产税为抵押进行借款，以帮助筹集 20 亿美元用于基础设施升级，这是与传统票箱信贷不同的新借款机制。【原文：New York City’s transit system plans to borrow against real estate taxes it receives to help raise $2 billion for infrastructure upgrades, creating a new borrowing mechanism that’s separate from its traditional farebox credit.】

item.title: 阿联酋穆巴达拉公司寻求改变欧洲初创企业以提高回报率
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，阿布扎比穆巴达拉投资公司（Mubadala Investment Co.【原文：Abu Dhabi’s Mubadala Investment Co. is taking an increasingly active approach to the European startups it backs as it seeks to improve returns, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 沙特公司正在洽谈收购卡特彼勒的南非合作伙伴
item.description: 据知情人士透露，沙特阿拉伯的扎希德集团（Zahid Group）正在洽谈收购卡特彼勒公司（Caterpillar Inc.【原文：Saudi Arabia’s Zahid Group is in talks to acquire an African distributer of Caterpillar Inc.’s equipment, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 部长称南非可在一年内解决港口积压问题
item.description: 南非总统府部长 Khumbudzo Ntshavheni 表示，南非的港口（世界上最差的港口之一）正在得到改善，国有运营商 Transnet SOC Ltd. 将在未来 12 到 14 个月内修复这些港口。【原文：South Africa’s ports — ranked among the world’s worst — are improving and state-owned operator Transnet SOC Ltd. will fix them within the next 12 to 14 months, Minister in the Presidency Khumbudzo Ntshavheni said.】

item.title: 俄罗斯称两人在入侵乌克兰边境地区时死亡
item.description: 俄罗斯当局说，至少有两人在他们所说的来自乌克兰边境的袭击中丧生，13 人受伤。【原文：Russian authorities said at least two people had been killed and 13 wounded in what they said was an assault from across the border with Ukraine.】

item.title: Focus Financial Partners 推迟 36.5 亿美元定期贷款交易
item.description: Focus Financial Partners 的 36.5 亿美元定期贷款计划被推迟，这是本周美国杠杆贷款交易的第三次推迟，因为最近几天的全球市场动荡抑制了债务市场的发行。【原文：A $3.65 billion term-loan package for Focus Financial Partners has been postponed, the third such instance this week for a US leveraged-loan deal as global market tumult of recent days has curbed debt market issuance.】

item.title: H&M不会因孟加拉国供应商的延误而寻求折扣
item.description: 瑞典零售商 H&M AB 告诉其在孟加拉国的供应商，不会因为工厂因致命抗议而关闭后可能出现的延误而要求打折。【原文：Swedish retailer H&M AB told its suppliers in Bangladesh that it won’t seek discounts due to delays that might occur after factories were shut down by deadly protests.】

item.title: 科拉诺维奇成为股市最后一只熊。现在他看起来是对的
item.description: 随着股市从突如其来的暴跌中回升，华尔街正在喋喋不休地讨论一位市场卡桑德拉，他曾警告过这种情况会发生，直到这让他丢掉了工作：摩根大通公司前策略师马尔科-科拉诺维奇。【原文：With stocks clawing back from a deep sudden swoon, Wall Street is chattering about the market Cassandra who warned that this would happen, until it cost him his job: former JPMorgan Chase & Co. strategist Marko Kolanovic.】

item.title: 乌拉圭央行行长认为通胀目标还有下调空间
item.description: 乌拉圭央行主席华盛顿-里贝罗（Washington Ribeiro）在接受采访时表示，随着货币政策控制住乌拉圭投资级同业中最快的通胀率之一，乌拉圭下届政府可能有余地设定较低的年度消费物价涨幅目标。【原文：Uruguay’s next government may have room to set a lower target for annual consumer price gains as monetary policy reins in one of the fastest inflation rates among the country’s investment grade peers, central bank Chairman Washington Ribeiro said in an interview.】

item.title: 德国连锁药店停止购买特斯拉，理由是马斯克支持特朗普
item.description: 德国连锁药店 Dirk Rossmann GmbH 将不再为其车队购买特斯拉公司的汽车，理由是埃隆-马斯克支持唐纳德-特朗普。【原文：The German drugstore chain Dirk Rossmann GmbH will no longer purchase Tesla Inc. vehicles for its fleet, citing Elon Musk’s support for Donald Trump.】

item.title: 华尔街专业人士保持头脑清醒，对冲工具开始重新发挥作用
item.description: 本周华尔街内外的戏剧性事件至少带来了一丝曙光：主要的防御性投资策略仍有生命力—；恢复了人们对近年来失灵的对冲交易的信心。【原文：There’s at least one silver lining from this week’s drama on Wall Street and beyond: Key defensive investing strategies are alive and well — restoring faith in hedging trades that have misfired in recent years.】

item.title: 杠杆贷款流出量将创 2023 年银行危机以来之最
item.description: 摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：Funds that invest in leveraged loans are on track to suffer their biggest weekly outflows since March 2023’s regional banking crisis, according to JPMorgan Chase & Co.】

item.title: 斯利姆斥资增持美国石油公司 PBF 和 Talos 的股份
item.description: 拉丁美洲首富卡洛斯-斯利姆（Carlos Slim）利用股市大跌的机会，增持了他在两家美国能源公司的多数股权。【原文：Carlos Slim, Latin America’s richest person, took advantage of the equity-market selloff to boost his majority stakes in two US energy companies.】

item.title: 周一大跌后多伦多预计将出现大规模补涨交易
item.description: 周一大跌期间，多伦多证券交易所因公民假日休市，周二加拿大股市将迎来一场令人心碎的补涨交易。【原文：Canadian stocks are poised for a gut-wrenching catch up trade on Tuesday, after the Toronto Stock Exchange was closed for a civic holiday during Monday’s selloff.】

item.title: 公司在波动性抑制交易后重回债券市场
item.description: 由于担心劳动力市场过快降温和经济走向衰退，潜在的债务发行人纷纷退避三舍，在经历了全球大跌之后，企业借款人又开始重返高等级债务市场。【原文：Corporate borrowers are easing back into the high-grade debt market after a global selloff — sparked by concerns the labor market is cooling too fast and the economy is heading for a recession — sidelined potential issuers.】

item.title: 巴基斯坦获得中国和阿联酋的债务延期保证
item.description: 巴基斯坦已获得中国、沙特阿拉伯和阿拉伯联合酋长国承诺将债务展期一年，这对该国来说是一个鼓舞，因为它正在等待国际货币基金组织对其新的 70 亿美元贷款计划的最终批准。【原文：Pakistan has secured commitments from China, Saudi Arabia and the United Arab Emirates to rollover debt for a year, a boost for the nation as it awaits a final approval for its new $7 billion loan program with the International Monetary Fund.】

item.title: 舍弗勒称电动车热潮将带动混合动力需求增长
item.description: 由于美国和中国的驾驶员更愿意购买混合动力汽车，电动汽车普及速度的不确定性日益增加，舍弗勒股份公司正在放慢纯电动零部件的生产速度。【原文：Schaeffler AG is slowing the ramp-up for all-electric components as drivers in the US and China prefer to buy hybrid vehicles with growing uncertainty around the speed of EV uptake.】

item.title: Pagaya 在次级汽车贷款机构中扩大人工智能核保范围
item.description: Pagaya Technologies Ltd. 通过与 OneMain Holdings Inc.【原文：Pagaya Technologies Ltd. is expanding its reach in the auto-lending industry through a new partnership with OneMain Holdings Inc.】

item.title: 爱科高层推动拖拉机制造商更换董事会
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，拖拉机和其他农业设备制造商爱科公司（AGCO Corp.【原文：AGCO Corp., a maker of tractors and other agricultural equipment, is facing demands for a board shakeup from its largest shareholder, people familiar with the matter said.】
